messages.speech:
Causes of stroke:

1. high blood pressure 
2. coronary artery disease 
3. mitral valve disease (disease of the heart valve) 
4. cardiomyopathy (wasting of the heart muscle) 
5. pericarditis (inflammation of the bag surrounding the heart) 
6. hyperthyroidism (overactive thyroid gland)
7. excessive alcohol intake 
8. drinking lots of caffeine
